about_the_game:
"Pathfinder RPG 2 - Pathfinder Society Quest #9: Wayfinder Origins

A Pathfinder Society Quest designed for levels 3-6 (subtiers 3-4 and 5-6).
The Pathfinder Society has sent an expedition to a previously uncharted island! The island contains a door sealed with a type of magical technology thought lost with the ancient Azlanti empire. What secrets lie behind the door, and what dangers may lurk beneath the island's surface? To find out, the PCs will first have to solve the magical "puzzle" sealing the door and preventing contact with whatever lies beyond.
Written by: Dustin Knight

Scenario tags:  Repeatable
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and Features the Following additions:

  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • Individual area descriptions linked to maps, containing new encounters, treasure parcels and descriptions for just that area
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
detailed_description:
"Pathfinder RPG 2 - Pathfinder Society Quest #9: Wayfinder Origins

A Pathfinder Society Quest designed for levels 3-6 (subtiers 3-4 and 5-6).
The Pathfinder Society has sent an expedition to a previously uncharted island! The island contains a door sealed with a type of magical technology thought lost with the ancient Azlanti empire. What secrets lie behind the door, and what dangers may lurk beneath the island's surface? To find out, the PCs will first have to solve the magical "puzzle" sealing the door and preventing contact with whatever lies beyond.
Written by: Dustin Knight
